name: HOMEXCEL Makeup Remover Cloth 12 Pack,Reusable Makeup Remover Pads, Washable Ultra Soft Facial Cleansing Cloths For All Skin Types, 5 X 5 In, Grey
short_description: Ultra Soft: Our makeup remover cloths are crafted from high-quality 80% polyester and 20% polyamide microfiber material. They are designed to be ultra soft and gentle to the touch, which are suitable for sensitive skin

Natural and Easy to Use: Using our makeup remover towels is a breeze. Simply wet the cloth with warm water or pair it with your favorite cleanser, then gently move it in a circular motion to remove all makeup. No need for cleansing oil or remover wipes, as our cloth effectively removes makeup, leaving your face clean and refreshed. This natural method is healthier for your skin

Compact and Easy to Carry: Our 5 " x 5 " reusable makeup remover pads are square-shaped and come in a charming grey color. They are compact and lightweight, making them convenient to carry in your handbag, purse, or travel bag. Use them whenever you need a quick and easy makeup removal solution. They also make perfect birthday or Christmas gifts for friends and loved ones on any occasion

Powerful Makeup Removal: Our microfiber face cloth features double-sided functionality. The plush side is ideal for deeper cleansing and exfoliation, while the soft side is perfect for effectively wiping away all types of makeup, including foundation, lipstick, eye shadows, sunscreen, mascara, blusher, concealer, and more. Enjoy powerful makeup removal in a gentle and efficient way

Reusable and Washable: With 12 makeup cloths in a pack, you have enough for your daily needs. Once they become dirty, simply place them in a mesh wash bag and toss them in the washing machine. Each makeup remover pad is equivalent to 2000 makeup wipes, saving you money and reducing unnecessary waste from daily disposable makeup remover wipes

short_description: Gentle enough to delicately cleanse any skin type. Also great to use for toner application.
Sustainable alternative to disposable cotton pads.
Each pad is machine washable and durable up to 40 times. 6 pads are included in washable pouch, for a total of up to 240 uses.

How to Use: 1. Apply makeup remover, oil based cleanser, or toner to reusable pad. 2. Gently wipe away makeup around face and eyes. Use each pad once. 3. Place used pads inside the drawstring laundry pouch to machine wash them for your next use.
Tool Care: Pads and pouch: Place pads in pouch to machine wash with warm water after each use. Dry flat. Dry normal, low heat. Do not iron. Do not dry clean.
